title: Please Help! My Club is gone!
body: So my club namned (Champions of Runeterra) is gone! And when I try to create it again, it says its unavailable!?!? Please help me Rito gods

replies.body: Chances are it's still there. It seems to be a common bug that owners lose access to their clubs.

Our clubs team has been looking into reports of club issues like this since it was restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  They're working on a solution, but I don't have any eta right now.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AsmX13QE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-04T18:31:45.363+0000)
>
> Our clubs team has been looking into reports of club issues like this since it was restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  They're working on a solution, but I don't have any eta right now.  Hang tight!

Thank you for updating me I appreciate, I just made an awesome club inviting Gold + players to meet chill people and improve together and then it was gone :(
Same problem I made a club and now It's not in my club list and I lost the tag but all my buddies in the club still have the tag and are in the club. They tell me im still the leader for it as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Bruton Gaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AsmX13QE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T09:34:19.467+0000)
>
> Same problem I made a club and now It's not in my club list and I lost the tag but all my buddies in the club still have the tag and are in the club. They tell me im still the leader for it as well.

We need a fix
